I need help adding my auto alignment to simulator Advantage Scope for Teleop to test out new stuff

i want to add like the movement of aligning to a reef like how it happens in real life. The limelight is in the front center

heres my github repo GitHub - Soulemane12/Reefscape-2025

thank you

Soulemane:

I need help adding my auto alignment to simulator Advantage Scope

AdvantageScope is not a simulator; it’s only able to present data that is provided to it (either from a log file or directly streamed from a robot) representing robot state. That is, AdvantageScope is only visualizing the simulation.

Simulation is a complex topic and can be done at multiple levels. I recommend viewing FRC Log Replay and Simulation as a starting point. While it focuses somewhat on AdvantageKit and the log replay capabilities it provides, the earlier part of the video covers different simulation architectures and the tradeoffs between them. (Note that the linked recording is from our 2024 World Championship conference presentation - the recording of the 2025 presentation will be available soon.)
